message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you. It is an exceptional opportunity that aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. We believe its value far exceeds $1,200,000, but considering the current market conditions and your potential benefit, we are offering it to you at this exclusive price of $1,500,000. This is a limited-time offer, and I encourage you to consider this proposal carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you're presenting, $1,500,000 is unfortunately outside my budget.  I'm very interested in the product and believe it has significant potential, but I'm only able to offer $1,200,000 at this time.  This is the maximum I'm able to spend, and I hope it's a fair price considering the value we both see in this opportunity.  Let me know what you think.
